text:
Group Nine Media | San Francisco, CA | Program Manager | Full Time | Onsite (w/ flexible WFH sched)

Group Nine Media is the parent company of The Dodo, Thrillist, NowThis, and Seeker. We're looking for someone who is passionate about improving the way teams work together to build products!

https://boards.greenhouse.io/groupninemedia/jobs/945391#.WiB...
